The TAs for the course are Meredith Brown, Carson Garcia, Rob Kravec, Shirley Mathur, Manny Mokel, Margaret Reed, and Camilla Yue.

Go to the [**STA 199 - Section 3 course website**](https://sta199-fa21-003.netlify.app) for course specific information.
